alert.note: Alert for Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:46PM MDT until May 26 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN POWDER RIVER COUNTY... At 344 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Biddle, or 23 miles southeast of Broadus, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Biddle and Belle Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the main floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
